titleStmt.title: The bloody inkeeper, or Sad and barbarous news from Glocester-shire being a true relation how the bodies of seven men and women were found murthered in a garden belonging to a house in Putley near Glocester. With the strange and miraculous manner how the same was discovered by a smith that lately took the house, digging to set up his anvil, and finding a knife in one of the bodies.

The bloody inkeeper, or Sad and barbarous news from Glocester-shire being a true relation how the bodies of seven men and women were found murthered in a garden belonging to a house in Putley near Glocester. With the strange and miraculous manner how the same was discovered by a smith that lately took the house, digging to set up his anvil, and finding a knife in one of the bodies.

notesStmt.note: Item is paginated, but wrongly imposed. Pagination is: 4 (on verso of t.p.), 5, 2, 3, [blank], 1, [blank].
